title: This was the coolest event and I hope we get more like this or LEAGUE OF LEGENDS 2
body:
https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2018/september/odygm/Augments_Equipping_640.jpg
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/jKjouZB1yjs/maxresdefault.jpg
https://static1.millenium.org/articles/5/31/10/25/@/696024-ap-malph-article_m-1.png
https://static1.millenium.org/articles/3/31/11/93/@/700128-ziggs-ap-opti-article_m-1.png
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DnbbKTdU8AApYjJ.jpg


Like who agrees this was the best event?
Hell if they did this for star guardian events or the next odyssey, or high noon, project, etc etc event I WOULD BE SOOOOOO INTO THAT
the rewards were decent
the gameplay was enjoyable even after many matches
and it was all in all interesting to play champs in a new way


Pls make more like Odyssey Extract in the future
